text: [Alloh taolo] Az osmon oʙe furu ʙorid, on goh rudho har jak ʙa andozai [ƣuncoisi] xud cori sudand va seloʙ kafk ruji xud ʙarovard va az on ci ʙar otas meafruzand [va megudozand], to zevar jo koloe ʙa dast ovarand, [niz] kafke hammonandi on [az oʙ ʙarmeojad]. Alloh taolo haqqu ʙotilro incunin misol mezanad. Va ammo kafk ʙa kanore meravad va nest megardad, vale on ci ʙa mardum sud merasonad, ʙar zamin [ʙoqi] memonad. Alloh taolo masalho incunin ʙajon mekunad
